name: Space Race Reactor (Original)
description:
Drag and drop atoms to build the largest molecules possible and drop them off to earn points. Build faster to heat up the reactor and earn more points, but don't overheat the reactor or it's game over.

Mouse to drag and drop atoms, A and D to rotate

A remade and more complete version is currently in the works.

A game by Dominic Aglialoro, Adriana DeCarlo, Sarah Galbraith, and David Sawczyn

Made in Unity
